abstract.p: Credits for photographs in special section Tech 2010

block.p: On the following pages, all photographs by Julius Rooymans for The New York Times. Stylist: Joseph Oppedisano. Digital Artist: Leonard van Vliet.
Cover and P. 21: Dress by Margie Tsai.
On the following pages, all photographs by Julius Rooymans for The New York Times. Stylist: Joseph Oppedisano. Digital Artist: Leonard van Vliet.
Cover and P. 21: Dress by Margie Tsai.
Pp. 54-55: Man's clothing by Prada Sport. Woman's clothing by Helmut Lang. Child's clothing by Samsonite.

Pp. 92-93: Man's suit: Helmut Lang. Shirt: Prada Sport. Shoes: DKNY. Woman's shoes: Arche.
On the following pages, all photographs by Julius Rooymans for The New York Times. Stylist: Evelien Reich. Digital artist: Leonard van Vliet.

P. 71: Shirt by Aziz Bekkaoui.
P. 87: Jacket by Versace. Shirt and tie: Hugo Boss. Watch: Design Is Dead.
P. 94: Suit by Yves Saint Laurent Rive Gauche. Shirt: Jean Paul Gaultier. Shoes: Mare. Tie: Dolce & Gabbana. Briefcase: Haliburton.
On the following pages, all photographs by Rebecca Pierce for The New York Times. Stylist: Maria Serra.

All photographs by Tom Schierlitz are for The New York Times. Stylist: Bettina Budewig.
